title: Chesapeake Shores - Pilot
synopsis: Abby (Meghan Ory) takes her twin daughters from New York back to her hometown in Maryland at the request of her sister Jess (Laci J. Mailey), where she clashes with her father Mick (Treat Williams) and runs into her high school sweetheart, Trace (Jesse Metcalfe).

title: Signed, Sealed, Delivered: The Movie
synopsis: Shane McInerney (Kristin Booth) joins the Dead Letter Office of the U.S. Postal Service, where dedicated leader Oliver O'Toole (Eric Mabius) and his team work to reunite a young couple who spent one day together and then were kept apart by tragic circumstances.

title: Legacy: Series Premiere
synopsis: During post-civil war, Ned Logan, a wealthy widower, is raising a family all on his own. Ned's streetwise adopted son clashes with his youngest son, Clay, as well as the southern society. Meanwhile, Sean reconsiders his impending engagement to debutante, Vivian Winters.

title: Little Men: Series Premiere
synopsis: Josephine (Jo) Bhaer and her husband Fritz have run a boarding school for boys for several years. Now that Fritz has died everyone assumes that Jo will close the school. When Nick, a sailor home from the sea, hires on as handyman, Jo sees that there is a chance to keep the school open.

title: Ties That Bind
synopsis: Police detective Allison McLean takes in her nephew and niece, Mariah and Cameron, after their father is sentenced to prison for two years. Allison and her husband, Matt, try to make the best of the new situation, which also includes their own teenagers Jeff and Rachel. Cameron's anger against Allison gets the best of him, as he blames her for his father going to prison. Meanwhile, Allison and her partner, Devin, work on a case involving a pregnant teen and her boyfriend who have just robbed a pharmacy.

title: Anastasia: The Mystery of Anna - Part 1
synopsis: Anna Anderson (Amy Irving) is found in a German asylum in the 1920s with an unbelievable story -- she is actually Anastasia, the daughter of Czar Nicholas II and the last surviving member of the royal Romanov family.

title: Anastasia: The Mystery of Anna - Part 2
synopsis: Anna Anderson (Amy Irving) is found in a German asylum in the 1920s with an unbelievable story -- she is actually Anastasia, the daughter of Czar Nicholas II and the last surviving member of the royal Romanov family.

title: Erich Segal's Only Love - Part 1
synopsis: Matthew (Rob Morrow), an American doctor in a war zone, must give up his true love Silvia, but after he returns home and settles down with single mother Evie (Marisa Tomei), Silvia comes back into his life needing his help.

title: Erich Segal's Only Love - Part 2
synopsis: Matthew (Rob Morrow), an American doctor in a war zone, must give up his true love Silvia, but after he returns home and settles down with single mother Evie (Marisa Tomei), Silvia comes back into his life needing his help.

series_name: THE OLDEST LIVING CONFEDERATE WIDOW TELLS ALL
title: The Oldest Living Confederate Widow Tells All - Part 1
synopsis: At age 99, Lucy (Anne Bancroft) is the last woman alive to have been married to a Confederate soldier, and she recalls her struggles as a younger woman (Diane Lane) through a century of turmoil.

series_name: THE OLDEST LIVING CONFEDERATE WIDOW TELLS ALL
title: The Oldest Living Confederate Widow Tells All - Part 2
synopsis: At age 99, Lucy (Anne Bancroft) is the last woman alive to have been married to a Confederate soldier, and she recalls her struggles as a younger woman (Diane Lane) through a century of turmoil.

title: Mama Flora's Family - Part 1
synopsis: Flora (Cicely Tyson) was born in poverty at the dawn of the 20th century and dedicated herself to creating a better life for her sons (Blair Underwood and Mario Van Peebles) and granddaughter (Queen Latifah).

title: Mama Flora's Family - Part 2
synopsis: Flora (Cicely Tyson) was born in poverty at the dawn of the 20th century and dedicated herself to creating a better life for her sons (Blair Underwood and Mario Van Peebles) and granddaughter (Queen Latifah).

series_name: JACKIE, ETHEL, JOAN: THE WOMEN OF CAMELOT
title: Jackie, Ethel, Joan: The Women of Camelot - Part 1
synopsis: Jackie (Jill Hennessy), Ethel (Lauren Holly) and Joan (Leslie Stefanson), the wives of the Kennedy brothers, develop a bond over times of political upheaval and personal tragedies.

series_name: JACKIE, ETHEL, JOAN: THE WOMEN OF CAMELOT
title: Jackie, Ethel, Joan: The Women of Camelot - Part 2
synopsis: Jackie (Jill Hennessy), Ethel (Lauren Holly) and Joan (Leslie Stefanson), the wives of the Kennedy brothers, develop a bond over times of political upheaval and personal tragedies.

title: The Titanic - Part 1
synopsis: A married woman (Catherine Zeta-Jones) has a chance reunion with her long-lost love (Peter Gallagher) and crosses paths with real-life figures like Molly Brown (Marliu Henner) onboard the doomed luxury liner in 1912.

title: The Titanic - Part 2
synopsis: A married woman (Catherine Zeta-Jones) has a chance reunion with her long-lost love (Peter Gallagher) and crosses paths with real-life figures like Molly Brown (Marliu Henner) onboard the doomed luxury liner in 1912.

series_name: MITCH ALBOM'S THE FIVE PEOPLE YOU MEET IN HEAVEN
title: Mitch Albom's The Five People You Meet In Heaven: Part One
synopsis: Eddie (Jon Voight), a war vet and amusement park worker, dies while trying to save a girl from an accident, and in the afterlife, five people help him understand the meaning of his life.

series_name: MITCH ALBOM'S THE FIVE PEOPLE YOU MEET IN HEAVEN
title: Mitch Albom's The Five People You Meet In Heaven: Part Two
synopsis: Eddie (Jon Voight), a war vet and amusement park worker, dies while trying to save a girl from an accident, and in the afterlife, five people help him understand the meaning of his life.

title: Tess of the D'Urbervilles: Part 1
synopsis: Based on Thomas Hardy's classic novel, Tess, a poor country girl, learns she is distantly related to the well-born D'Urberville family, so she travels to their estate and meets the charming but dangerous Alec.

title: Tess of the D'urbervilles: Part 2
synopsis: Based on Thomas Hardy's classic novel, Tess, a poor country girl, learns she is distantly related to the well-born D'Urberville family, so she travels to their estate and meets the charming but dangerous Alec.

title: Gulliver's Travels - Part 1
synopsis: Based on Jonathan Swift's story, Lemuel Gulliver (Ted Danson) returns to his home to his wife (Mary Steenburgen) after being gone for years with unbelievable tales of a land filled with very tiny people and another with enormous giants.

title: Gulliver's Travels - Part 2
synopsis: Based on Jonathan Swift's story, Lemuel Gulliver (Ted Danson) returns to his home to his wife (Mary Steenburgen) after being gone for years with unbelievable tales of a land filled with very tiny people and another with enormous giants.

series_name: JIM HENSON'S JACK & THE BEANSTALK: THE REAL STORY
title: Jim Henson's Jack & the Beanstalk: The Real Story - Part 1
synopsis: With puppets and effects from Jim Henson's Creature Shop, it's a modern update of the fairy tale where a businessman named Jack (Matthew Modine) discovers his ancestor really did climb a beanstalk to the land of the giants.

series_name: JIM HENSON'S JACK & THE BEANSTALK: THE REAL STORY
title: Jim Henson's Jack & the Beanstalk: The Real Story - Part 2
synopsis: With puppets and effects from Jim Henson's Creature Shop, it's a modern update of the fairy tale where a businessman named Jack (Matthew Modine) discovers his ancestor really did climb a beanstalk to the land of the giants.

series_name: JOURNEY TO THE CENTER OF THE EARTH
title: Journey to the Center of the Earth - Part 1
synopsis: Based on the Jules Verne novel, geologist Theodore Lytton (Treat Williams) and his nephew Jonas (Jeremy London) are enlisted by a wealthy woman find her missing husband by venturing into a volcano to find a secret underground realm.

series_name: JOURNEY TO THE CENTER OF THE EARTH
title: Journey to the Center of the Earth - Part 2
synopsis: Based on the Jules Verne novel, geologist Theodore Lytton (Treat Williams) and his nephew Jonas (Jeremy London) are enlisted by a wealthy woman find her missing husband by venturing into a volcano to find a secret underground realm.

title: In The Beginning: Part 1
synopsis: Abraham (Martin Landau) is called on to lead his followers to a new land, and passes his staff down through the generations.

title: In The Beginning: Part 2
synopsis: Abraham (Martin Landau) is called on to lead his followers to a new land, and passes his staff down through the generations.

title: The Ten Commandments: Part One
synopsis: The story of Moses, from his narrow escape from death to his leadership of the Hebrew people to the parting of the Red Sea.

title: The Ten Commandments: Part Two
synopsis: The story of Moses, from his narrow escape from death to his leadership of the Hebrew people to the parting of the Red Sea.

title: Noah's Ark: Part One
synopsis: Noah and his three sons, Japheth, Shem and Ham, are instructed by God to build a huge boat that is large enough to hold two of every animal.

title: Noah's Ark: Part Two
synopsis: Noah and his three sons, Japheth, Shem and Ham, are instructed by God to build a huge boat that is large enough to hold two of every animal.

series_name: SHERLOCK HOLMES AND THE INCIDENT AT VICTORIA FALLS
title: Sherlock Holmes and the Incident at Victoria Falls: Part 1
synopsis: Holmes (Christopher Lee) and Watson (Patrick Macnee) are asked by the King to protect a diamond on route to South Africa, but a murderous thief is on their trail.

series_name: SHERLOCK HOLMES AND THE INCIDENT AT VICTORIA FALLS
title: Sherlock Holmes and the Incident at Victoria Falls: Part 2
synopsis: Holmes (Christopher Lee) and Watson (Patrick Macnee) are asked by the King to protect a diamond on route to South Africa, but a murderous thief is on their trail.

series_name: SHERLOCK HOLMES AND THE LEADING LADY
title: Sherlock Holmes and the Leading Lady: Part 1
synopsis: Sherlock (Christopher Lee) is tasked by his brother to travel to Vienna to recover stolen plans for a bomb, where he is reunited by the alluring Irene Adler (Morgan Fairchild).

series_name: SHERLOCK HOLMES AND THE LEADING LADY
title: Sherlock Holmes and the Leading Lady: Part 2
synopsis: Sherlock (Christopher Lee) is tasked by his brother to travel to Vienna to recover stolen plans for a bomb, where he is reunited by the alluring Irene Adler (Morgan Fairchild).

title: Heidi: Part 1
synopsis: Young orphaned girl Heidi is sent to live with her gruff grandfather (Jason Robards) at his cabin in the Swiss Alps, where she eventually warms his embittered heart.

title: Heidi: Part 2
synopsis: Young orphaned girl Heidi is sent to live with her gruff grandfather (Jason Robards) at his cabin in the Swiss Alps, where she eventually warms his embittered heart.
